Larger cache -> faster sync. If you're running a Bitcoin node on a machine with 8GB of RAM or more, set dbcache=8000 or greater in order to get a huge performance boost on your initial sync time by keeping the entire UTXO set in memory. It peaks at around 7.4 GB at the moment.
